read_fp_pool(connection, scenario, ...[, ...])

sql = "SELECt fp.trajectory_pool_id, fp.route_pool_id, fp.icao_orig, fp.icao_dest, fp.bada_code_ac_model, fp.fp_distance_nm, fpp.sequence, fpp.name, ST_X(fpp.coords) as lat, ST_Y(fpp.coords) as lon, fpp.alt_ft, fpp.time_min, fpp.dist_from_orig_nm, fpp.dist_to_dest_nm, fpp.wind, fpp.ansp, fpp.weight, fpp.fuel FROM "+fp_pool_table+" fp JOIN "+fp_pool_point_table+" fpp on fpp.fp_pool_id=fp.id JOIN "+trajectory_pool_table+" tp on tp.id = fp.trajectory_pool_id JOIN "+route_pool_table+" rp on rp.id = fp.route_pool_id JOIN "+flight_schedule_table+" fs ON fs.origin = rp.icao_orig and fs.destination = rp.icao_dest JOIN "+flight_subset_table+" fsb ON fsb.flight_id = fs.nid JOIN "+scenario_table+" s ON s.flight_set = fsb.subset WHERE tp.version = "+str(trajectories_version)+" AND s.id = "+str(scenario)+" ORDER BY fp.id, fpp.sequence;"
